requirements:
3+ years experience developing server-side software using C++, Java, Go, or another strongly typed language
Understanding of HTTP and socket programming
Experience with version control systems (such as SVN or Git)
Experience building and running software in a Linux environment using the command line interface
responsibilities:
Work with stakeholders to help facilitate technical solutions to address problems or implement feature requests.
Ensure that projects are completed on-time and with proper handling of source code via version control.
Release updates in highly controlled and supervised methods, as well as establish adequate testing procedures to prevent negative impact to the overall business.
Review error reports to identify potential problems proactively; suggest new reports and ways to visualize data.
Track down and eliminate bugs in both code written by the developer and others.
Thoroughly document processes and policies, as well as conduct insightful post-mortem analysis.
title: Software Developer

requirements:
Excellent knowledge and experience with a backend language like Java, Node.js, Go, C++
BS/MS in Computer Science or an equivalent field with 5+ years of industry work experience
Excellent knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and coding
Strong designing and building distributed backend systems handling high volumes of traffic
Experience in handling ambiguous business requirements with excellent prioritization, time management abilities, and a focus on execution
Passion to tackle exciting engineering problems and make continuous improvements
responsibilities:
Design, develop and operate scalable and resilient distributed services that run on Kubernetes or ECS
Collaborate with various functional teams across Tinder on the expansion of our service platform
Influence the team roadmap and product development
Recruit, encourage, and develop other team members
title: Senior Backend Engineer

requirements:
0-2 years of UI development experience
B.S. in Computer Science or a related degree
Development experience with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, working on applications with backend microservices and database components
Experience with JavaScript libraries and frameworks such as React/Redux and/or Angular
Experience in development of, and/or integration with web services and RESTful APIs
responsibilities:
Work with the UX designers to understand requirements and build front-end web application components and applications
Build web applications written in a variety of technologies (React, Typescript), including building of reusable UI components in a modularized manner
Implement or integrate authentication and authorization features into the web application following a standard OAuth Flow
Implement security conscious mid-tier APIs to service the web applications
Understand how to support frontend web applications on various browsers and possible resolutions
Ensure solid unit and integration test code coverage
Work with the UX designers to understand requirements and build front-end web application components and applications
Develop high-performance JavaScript-based front-end functionality using modern design patterns
Establish and adhere to best practices in Design Thinking and User-Centric principles
title: Frontend Engineer

requirements:
Minimum of 3 years of experience in Python, Scala, or Java
Minimum of 3 years of building, scaling, and optimizing machine learning systems
Familiar with Hybrid Feature Selection and Bayesian Search
Works well in a team environment, with talented people both inside of engineering and other teams
Write clear, legible, and understandable code
Experience taking projects from idea through to completion, and iterating to improve them
In the US, preferably in the Pacific Time zone
Online communication, team collaboration skills, and English proficiency a must
responsibilities:
Design, build, and deliver Machine Learning models and components to solve real problems
Use your understanding of Modeling Techniques, data, model training, hyperparameter tuning, and validation, to inform decision making
Collaborate as part of a cross functional team to solve customer requirements
Retrain, maintain, and monitor existing models
Leverage cloud-based tools and technologies to deliver ML models at scale
title: ML Engineer
